summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing the Mayor to execute an agreement with the Washington State Department of Transportation for Federal Aid to Urban systems (FAUS) funds for the Alaskan Way Seawall and Promenade Phase II - Surface Improvements project; authorizing the acceptance of such funds when received; increasing the expenditure allowance in the 1986 Budget of the Seattle Engineering Department; and making reimbursable appropriations from the Engineering Department Operating Fund and the Arterial Development Fund for construction activities therefor.
